title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.2 - Stopping within toll zone
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.2 - Stopping within toll zone

State Regulations

All traffic shall stop within the toll zone and not proceed
until so directed by the toll collector. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
